EmailTemplate.name: Pilot Webinars.Smart Landing/Smart Runway
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Honeywell SmartLanding/SmartRunway Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Honeywell SmartLanding/SmartRunway Webinar Honeywell Smart Landing/Smart Runway Webinar You're invited to participate in this Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar, hosted by Roger Moore - Honeywell Program Pilot. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- Discuss features of SmartRunway/SmartLanding - A review of functions within the system - Examples of how system provides timely audible and visual advisories to crew members
Date: Wednesday, November 19, 2014 Time: 08:00 - 09:00 AM PST (GMT-8) Duration: 60 minutes Click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell SmartLandingSmartRunway Webinar.ics> to download an invitation with the link and phone number for the webinar. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
